review_text: I already have one of these I had purchased a year ago on Amazon, and, I absolutely love it.  It does a great job chopping onions, pecans, tomatoes, cilantro, etc.  I ordered this one for my daughter, and, she loves it.  I use this mini a lot more than I use my food processor.  The size works great, especially when baking!  I highly recommend!
product_name: Cuisinart DLC-1 Mini-Prep Food Processor, White
